snippet.title: Arcade Game: Anti-Aircraft (1975 Atari)
snippet.description:
An shooting game where you play a ship shooting down air bombers down. They arrive by either one or two either on the left or right. If a bomber is not brought down on the first shoot, it will reappear in the same place. The player can shoot the bombers again. Each player has 3 positions to fire their shots, which are used for range. The cannon is used for hitting a bulls eye, and scoring for each downed bomber.

Emulation of the game seems to lack sound. 

Anyone interested in trying out this game here it is:
http://adamulation.blogspot.com/

You also need the roms:

http://www.retroroms.net/modules/newbb/dl_attachment.php?attachid=1367405739&post_id=54129
